Message:
I finally found
the man with the staff...
and soon engaged him
in combat.

But just before I could
strike him down...
a bright light
emanated from his staff.

As I was bathed in its light,
countless memories buried
within me began to resurface.

A witch—no, that is not true.
She is...

The one I vowed to
protect was her,

I nearly ended hers
in cold blood!

If only I could just
die by your hands...

But if that were to happen,
I wouldn’t be able to save you.

Even if I’ve lost all hope of
ever seeing you smile again...
I’ll stop at nothing to save you.
